meanings.sent1: I singularize my thoughts before writing them down.
meanings.sent2: She always singularizes her belongings to keep track of them.
meanings.sent3: The detective had to singularize the clues to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: His unique talent singularizes him from the rest of the team.
meanings.sent5: The artist's signature style singularizes her work in the art world.

meanings.definition: To distinguish as separate or unique
meanings.sent1: It is important to singularize each key point in the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The teacher singularizes the exceptional students for special attention.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to singularize the secret ingredient in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter singularizes her in a room full of serious faces.
meanings.sent5: The rare flower's vibrant color singularizes it in the garden.
